instruction: Insert sentences in the gaps of the following paragraph
input: The recent pandemic has been an incredibly difficult time for everyone. ____ ____ As pain and suffering swept the world, many people experienced hardship they never thought they'd have to face. ____
output: However, amidst it all, a spirit of unity and resilience shone through. Everyone pulled together and worked hard to get through it. Additionally, governments and non-profits provided a lot of aid and assistance to those in need.
